Package camzup.kotlin

Class KtMat3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Mat3
camzup.kotlin.KtMat3
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<KtVec3>
public class KtMat3 extends Mat3 implements Iterable<KtVec3>
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for three dimensional matrices.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    KtMat3.M3Iterator
    An iterator, which allows a matrix's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.

    • div

      public KtMat3 div(float b)
      Returns a new matrix with the division of the instance by the right operand. For interoperability with Kotlin: a / b . Does not mutate the matrix in place.
      Parameters:
      b - the right operand
      Returns:
      the quotient
      See Also:
      • times(float)

    • divAssign

      public void divAssign(float b)
      Divides the instance by the right operand (mutates the matrix in place). For interoperability with Kotlin: a /= b .
      Parameters:
      b - the right operand
      See Also:
